prompts.title_generation: Create 3 title in german for an {PLACEHOLDER_TYPE} about the topic '{PLACEHOLDER_TEXT}'. The title should be formulated {PLACEHOLDER_TONALITY}.
prompts.content_generation: Generate 3 {PLACEHOLDER_TYPE} article in german with approx. {WORD_COUNT} words about the topic '{PLACEHOLDER_TEXT}'. The article should be written {PLACEHOLDER_TONALITY} and shall not hold a title.
prompts.translation: Translate the following text from {SRC_LNG} to {TRG_LNG}: '{PLACEHOLDER_TEXT}'.
prompts.summarization: Please write a summary about maximum {Summary_COUNT} words of the following text in the original language: '{PLACEHOLDER_TEXT}'.
prompts.spellchecking: Check the following text for spelling and grammatical errors and correct them directly in the text in the original language: '{PLACEHOLDER_TEXT}'.
prompts.rewording: Create a paraphrased version of the following text in the german language: '{PLACEHOLDER_TEXT}'.
prompts.keywords: Please analyse the following text and extract the {KEYWORDS_COUNT} most important keywords in the original language: '{PLACEHOLDER_TEXT}'
